attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why is it that british people are not giving homes to live in i have been on the streets of brighton for six months as a woman i have been shouted at, threated by men and woman and today a grown man kicked a ball at my head i have high blood presure and my my doctor has put me on tablets for life i sell the big issue on western road in brigton so i can afford to eat as i dont get any sick money i sleep in a park where lots of teenagers rome around all night drinking and smashing the park ;up this life is not chosen my three children live with my sister and they dont no that i live on the streets.social services are to blame they are there to keep familys together no rip them apart my ex husband beat me for ten years yet they did not get involved when i needed there help for accomadtion they took my children away and put me on the streets karen smith

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
